item.title: RedNote Recruited US Influencers to Promote App Amid TikTok Ban Uncertainty
item.description: A marketing campaign brief obtained by WIRED reveals how the Chinese app is trying to capitalize on its sudden international popularity.

item.title: Best Running Underwear to Beat Burn on Your Bits (2025)

item.title: How to Use Parental Controls in Your Google, Apple, and Microsoft Accounts
item.description: The three biggest tech companies all offer a wealth of options to limit screen time, find lost devices, and more.

item.title: How to Use Apple’s Genmoji to Create New Kinds of Emojis
item.description: Apple Intelligence lets you generate custom emojis when the default options aren’t hitting it.
